pause(boolean) - Method in class codeandchords.input.Input
Pauses the Gain connected to ac.out.
pause(boolean) - Method in class codeandchords.Melody
Used to pause or un-pause the Instrument; calls pauseNote(input) on the Instrument instance variable.
pauseNote(boolean) - Method in class codeandchords.Instrument
Pauses or un-pauses the Instrument by passing this.wavePlayer, this.frequencyGlide and this.gainEnvelope to either a PauseTrigger or StartTrigger.
playMelody(String, float, String, int) - Method in class codeandchords.Melody
Calls the other playMelody with the Instrument instance variable, instead of requiring one from the user.
playMelody(String, float, String, int, Instrument) - Method in class codeandchords.Melody
Sets the instance variables with the same names to the values of the parameters, then starts the thread that will send them to the playMelodyThread method.
playNote(Note) - Method in class codeandchords.Instrument
Sets the attack, decay, sustain, and release envelopes, then either pauses the WavePlayer (for rests) or sets it to the frequency of the given Note.

R

RealTimeInput - Class in codeandchords.input
 
RealTimeInput(int, PApplet) - Constructor for class codeandchords.input.RealTimeInput
Creates an Input object connected to PortAudio, with the given number of inputs.
RealTimeInput(int, boolean, PApplet) - Constructor for class codeandchords.input.RealTimeInput
Creates an Input object connected to PortAudio, with the given number of inputs, as well as the option to skip inputs 5-8 (this assumes that you will have adjusted for the skip and passed in 4 more inputs than you plan to need; e.g., numInputs = 16 for 12 lines).
RealTimeInput(int, AudioContext, PApplet) - Constructor for class codeandchords.input.RealTimeInput
Creates an Input object with the given number of inputs and particular AudioContext.
RealTimeInput(int, AudioContext, boolean, PApplet) - Constructor for class codeandchords.input.RealTimeInput
Creates an Input object with the given number of inputs and the particular AudioContext, as well as the option to skip inputs 5-8 (this assumes that you will have adjusted for the skip and passed in 4 more inputs than you plan to need; e.g., numInputs = 16 for 12 lines).
RealTimeInput(PApplet) - Constructor for class codeandchords.input.RealTimeInput
Constructor for creating a one (or two?)-channel Input object from the machine's default audio input device; does not require Jack.
